Header.Title: Talk with Howdy
Header.Subtitle: Overcome language barriers by communicating with native speakers and our artificial intelligence.

WhatIs.Title: What is Howdy?
WhatIs.Subtitle: The platform to improve communication in other languages with people from all around the world.

HowDoes.Title: How Does It Work?
HowDoes.Step1: 1. Click on 'Sign Up' and create your account. Accessible from your favorite browser and any device.
HowDoes.Step2: 2. You will see people who speak the language you want to learn and who want to learn your language while teaching theirs.
HowDoes.Step3: 3. You can choose among them based on your interests and send them a friend request.
HowDoes.Step4: 4. Complete your profile if you haven't done so already and upload posts. Just like in chats, others can correct you.
HowDoes.Step5: 5. At any time, choose to practice with AI, which will help you improve your writing and expand your vocabulary.
HowDoes.Step6: 6. Check out our blog and find helpful guides for language learning.

Guide.Title: The Best Steps to Learn a Language
Guide.Subtitle: Learning guides and updates in our newsletter
Guide.Disclaimer: I have read and agree to the privacy policy and subscription conditions for the newsletter.

NotChat.Title: Chat with friends
NotChat.Subtitle: Send and receive messages through Howdy, respecting the community.
